full_summary:
---

**Snow Removal Services at Kouchibouguac National Park**
---

**Notice ID:** cb-7965-30251724

**Amendment:** 2

**Solicitation Number:** 5P300-23-0073/A

**Publication Date:** August 8, 2023

**Closing Date:** September 6, 2023 at 13:00 Hours

**Description:**
Parks Canada has a requirement for the supply of labour, material, and equipment necessary for snow plowing, salting, and/or sanding of all roads and parking lots within Kouchibouguac National Park located in Kent County, New Brunswick. The service contract is required for the period from November 15, 2023, to April 30, 2026, with an option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods.

**Services to be Provided:**

* Snow plowing, salting, and/or sanding of all roads and parking lots within Kouchibouguac National Park
* Labour, material, and equipment necessary for the services
* Maintenance of roads and parking lots to ensure safe access to the park

**Period of Contract/Delivery Date:**

* The work is to be performed from November 15, 2023, to April 30, 2026
* The contractor grants Canada the irrevocable option to extend the term of the contract by up to three additional one-year periods under the same conditions

**Optional Site Visit:**

* A site visit is highly recommended for bidders to familiarize themselves with the work site and the conditions of the park
* The site visit will be held on August 29, 2023, at 13:00 Hours
* Bidders must communicate with the contracting authority by August 25, 2023, at 14:00 Hours to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend

**Contact Information:**

* Hélène Perriard
* Contracting Authority
* Email: [helene.periard@pc.gc.ca](mailto:helene.periard@pc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (873) 355-3504
* Fax: (877) 558-2349

**Instructions to Bidders:**

* Bidders must submit their offers via email or fax
* Bidders must not submit their offers in person or by courier
